body.name: FOROUME 10 Pack Elastic Sleeves for Leak Proofing, Cruise Ship Essentials, Travel Accessories Luggage For Women Men, Travel Essentials Silicone Bottle Covers, Fit Most Travel Size Bottles Toiletries
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Friday, February 23 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
features: Travel Essentials: This silicone sleeves help to prevent the liquid leaking in your makeup bag or suitcase. Suitable for most travel containers, such as travel size toiletries, shampoo bottles, cosmetics, bath bottles, sunscreen, etc. Suitable for both men and women. Great travel essential toiletries.

10 Pcs Rubber Covers for Travel Size Toiletries: 5 Colors silicone covers for travel toiletries are made of food grade silicone material and will not tear even after long time use. Lightweight, very convenient to carry for both long and short distances.

Easy To Clean/Convenient To Use: Can be cleaned directly underwater, easy to install. Directly put the leak-proof sleeve on the shampoo, it can be stably fixed on the toiletry container, the silicone material can absorb the bottle to avoid leakage while traveling.

Reusable Travel Containers Sleeves For Toiletries: These leak-proof sleeves are made of silicone-durable, resilient, reusable, stretchable, and seal most full-size and travel-size toiletries. They return to their original shape after each use. (NOT FOR PUMP TOPS)

Versatile Use: Leak Proof Cover for Airplane, Train, Automobile and Cruise Travel - Protect your luggage and carry-on from leaks due to changes in air pressure and around your home. Put them on your cosmetic foundation glass bottles and the rest on your shampoo and conditioner without any issues.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Previous page Travel Toiletries Bottle Fits most travel toiletries and cosmetics Note: Not suitableforpump tops! Easy To Clean Quickly cleanable and reusable Simply rinse and place down to drain excess water. Durable & Stretchable It's very flexible and easy to put on and take off Does not affect the next use, it returns to its original state after each use. Easy To Carry Give you peace of mind on your journey Silicone leak proofing sleeves are suitable for protecting liquid items from spills during travel. Next page 1 Travel Toiletries Bottle 2 Easy To Clean 3 Durable & Stretchable 4 Easy To Carry

Does it fit all bottles? Fits most travel toiletries and cosmetics such as sunscreen, toothpaste, shampoo, conditioner, cleanser and more. (NOTE: Does not apply to pump caps!) Is this sealed tight? Will it leak easily? This is definitely a novelty, I put it over my plastic travel size bottles of conditioner, shampoo and oil and there was not a single leak. It's so flexible that it's still tight and as good as new after removing it with multiple uses. Can I take it on the airplane? Of course you can, for airplanes, trains, automobiles, cruise trips, etc. I've taken them through many cities and they've always worked perfectly, long or short distances, silicone covers are very easy to carry. Is it disposable? Does it really work as well as described? It works very well! Not only is it reusable, but it's also very easy to just wash it in water. It's exactly what I expected. You simply pull them off to cover the top of the container. Elastic sleeves are a great sealer to protect your products. Will these work for standard size? Yes, these are very flexible and fit round, oval, any shape and more. They are also flexible when using them and can stretch to fit all or most toiletries.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 5, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Odd little prophylactic looking covers
reviews.reviewText: Pros:- Pack of 10 elastic sleeves.- Specifically designed for travel accessories.- Suitable for both men and women.- Compatible with most travel-size bottles for toiletries.Cons:- May not fit all bottle sizes.- Elasticity may vary, affecting the secure fit.- Effectiveness may depend on bottle design.- Very odd looking if you dont know what they are meant for

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 21, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Useful for travel
reviews.reviewText: These bottle sleeves are the perfect travel companion. As someone who has had bottle burst open in my luggage, I can tell you how quickly that can ruin your vacation. These sleeves slip over your bottles in order to prevent them from bursting open and if they do leak slightly they can contain the small amount of spill that might come out. These have a fairly impressive stretch to go over a variety of size bottles, and are easy to clean if they do get dirty. The size of the bottles will dictate how far down the sleeves will go, so it will vary depending on the bottle. I haven't been concerned about any of the sleeves tearing, or anything like that which is good. For the price, if you travel with anything larger, or that might be prone to leaking, these sleeves could be extremely helpful, and I would recommend them.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 2, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great to keep liquids from spilling
reviews.reviewText: FOROUME 10 Pack Elastic Sleeves for Leak Proofing, Travel Essentials For Women MenLove these! They are like thick, stretchy balloons that hold your liquids in the bottle for travel. I call them bottle condoms. (Let's see if that gets past the censors!)PROS:- Washable and reusable- Durable - Altho they seem thin, I tried to rip one and couldn't. They should last a long time.- Flexible Range: There are 10 sleeves, all the same size. I am able to use them on bottles as small as 1" diameter, and stretch them for ones as large as 3 1/2". It could probably go a bit bigger, but that was a already a stretch. : ) All formed a tight seal that wouldn't let liquid leak.- They are thin enough that I was able to put one over a bottle and still put the cap on it. That's great for leaving the sleeve on while in my luggage, but just using the cap that comes with it when I'm in the hotel.SUGGESTION: They are all the same size, though different colors. I would have preferred a variety of sizes, including one a bit smaller to fit over the stem of an open bottle of wine. I did try to put one over an open glass of wine - and that worked.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 6, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great idea to keep you potions and lotions where they belong.
reviews.reviewText: I've had personal items leak in my overnight bag before and it was a mess. I started putting them in zippy bags, but even then, if they leak, it's still a big mess in there. These work like a charm. Seal tightly over just about any kind of bottle/tube and the extra length means they don't come off easy. Wish I had these years ago when I was traveling for work all the time.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 10, 2024
reviews.reviewText: These will be nice to put on my liquid filled bottles when traveling. I used to put all of them in a Ziploc bag but that didn’t prevent a bottle from leaking if it got jostled around too much, but it seems like these will solve that problem since they tightly cover each bottle individually. They are quite stretchy and a bit difficult to get on but they do fit a variety of different sizes.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 7, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great for summer vacations
reviews.reviewText: These covers are amazing for sunscreen, shampoo and lotion. Perfect to use them when traveling and avoid the bottles from spilling its contents. They are practical and great value for the money.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 22, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Gives peace of mind when packing
reviews.reviewText: I got these since in the past I have had bottles come open on me and make a mess in my bag. I have used them a few times. None of the bottles have come open yet so I haven’t had to clean the sleeve but it doesn’t seem like it would be hard if you had to. I feel like they go on tight enough that it doesn’t even allow anything to flip the caps open. I will continue to use these for my travel and if I have any mishaps I will update here.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 10, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars NOT for LARGE Bottles/Tubes or PUMP Bottles
reviews.reviewText: These five (white, yellow, pink, blue, green) silicone bottle/tube covers prevent leaks in your luggage during travel. They are all one size and fit smaller travel sized bottles/tubes. Not for use with pump bottles. They stretch up to four times there original size. Not intended for use with large bottles/tubes.

reviews.reviewTitle: FOROUME Lot de 10 manchons élastiques anti-fuite,

reviews.reviewText: PROS:* These are essentially silicone condoms that help protect personal liquid containers from leaking during travel.* I managed to stretch the product over a 3.5" diameter container without issue. This might be the limit for this product.* The product seals well when they are stretched a bit.* The product compresses nicely when they are not in use.CONS:* It would have been useful to at least provide two, perhaps three different sizes in the pack.* The product packaging should warn users of potential choking hazard.NOTES:* Keep in mind as you stretch this product over larger diameter containers, the material gets significantly thinner - like when a party air balloon is inflated. Therefore, any sharp-like object that comes in contact with the product surface will likely tear it open.* The manufacturer could have just made them all the same colour, like white or clear.* The seal might be less than optimal when a paper bottle label crosses the seal boundary. So beware.SUMMARY:This is a practical product that saves you dealing with a potentially messy travel bag. In addition, they are easy to rinse and reuse.

I saw these all over tiktok and had to try them out.They fit over basically anything. There are two rings towards the opening for grip.I stretched the covers out and then slid them overtop the bottles. As you can see in my photo, some bottles it doesnt sit right and leaves a small air bubble. I chalk this up to user error.I was a little nervous at first. I could see the cover stretched very thin on a bottle and thought it would rip. It didnt! I have pretty long and almond shaped nails. They could have also ripped them and it didnt!If you have stretched out a balloon or have used an “adult latex item”. You can use this easily

The pack has 10 silicon protective covers , they are great to have when travelling to cover the sprays, shampoos and creams.They stretch well to cover shampoo bottles.They definitely provide a peace of mind when traveling, as it makes the product inside leak proof.However I use there was a smaller size included for smaller makeup creams.

I like travelling with full-size products that I actually use at home, and these covers are must-haves for me. The shampoo and conditioner bottles as well as any other kind of pump bottles can be covered securely with this item. It is very stretchy, so it can cover the bigger caps as well. All the bottles feel securely covered, and so far I didn’t have any spill in the bag. I think it is cost effective as well, given so many in a pack and one pack is enough for all my skincare/hair/body products. I would recommend trying a pack for travelling if you travel with full size bottles and pump bottles.
